results.title: Farm work: equipment maintenance. Ep. 3. Reconditioning a two-bottom tractor plow
results.creator_credit: Calvin Productions and United States. Office of Education
results.brief_description: Shows how a tractor plough should be examined and repaired at the end of each ploughing season. Shows how to repair the front furrow wheel, the landslide wheel and the lift asembly; how to recondition the ploughshares; how to adjust the coulter; how to find the centre of resistance of the plough bottoms; establish the line of draft; and adjust the hitch; and how to mix the ingredients of the prime coat for painting farm machinery.
results.title_for_label: Farm work: equipment maintenance. Ep. 3. Reconditioning a two-bottom tractor plow
results.creator_credit_for_label: Calvin Productions and United States. Office of Education

results.title: Farm work: equipment maintenance. Ep. 2. Reconditionog a mower (drive system)
results.creator_credit: Calvin Productions and United States. Office of Education
results.brief_description: How to remove, clean, lubricate and replace the wheel assembly; how to remove and replace the flywheel shaft and bearings; how to replace the wrist pin; how to disassemble, clean and replace gear assembly; how to lubricate the drive system.

results.title: Farm work: equipment maintenance. Ep. 1. Reconditioning a mower (cutter bar)
results.creator_credit: Calvin Productions and United States. Office of Education
results.brief_description: How to check and repair the cutter bar mechanism of the mower. How to remove and replace worn sections in the sickle; how to sharpen the sickle sections; how to replace and adjust the knife clips and wearing plates; how to align the ledger plates; how to adjust the cutter bar for proper lead; how to adjust the sickle for register.

results.title: Farm animals
results.brief_description: A visit to an American farm where cows, horses, pigs, goats and sheep and their young are introduced to city children who might not otherwise have an opportunity to study domestic animals.

results.title: Farewell Arabia
results.creator_credit: Randal Beattie, International Television Federation and Rediffusion
results.brief_description: An account of what the discovery of oil has done to the tiny sheikdom of Abu Dhabi whose population of 200,000 were still living a simple life. The film shows the continuity of old customs and the incursion of new pressures brought about by foreign salesmen wanting to sell their goods and expertise in return for the oil-fed dollars. Also shows 20th century medicine trying to battle TB, eye diseases and the traditionalism of the people. Written and narrated by David Holden.

results.title: Far East
results.brief_description: A political thriller which exposes the violent and exploitative realities of multi-national companies in SE Asia. Against this background, three Australians drift between stability and desperation. This is a tough story of human emotions stretched to the limit by war, love and mystery. Cast includes Helen Morse and Bryan Brown.

constellations_other.name: Reality TV me
constellations_other.description: Cult documentary Grey Gardens follows the everyday eccentricities of mother and daughter Big Edie and Little Edie. The women perform and speak candidly to the camera, and have been described as predecessors to reality TV stars.
